trophies.trophyName: On an Endless Adventure, Once Again!
trophies.trophyDetail:
[PSO2] Proof of clearing a quest in Multiplayer.
Our adventure is just beginning!  We're counting on you for the next quest!

[PSO2] Proof of triggering a PSE burst.
The rising pillar of light is a sign of benediction! Now the real battle begins!

[PSO2] Proof of creating a weapon with a +10 enhancement.
The will to never retreat, a spirit that never wavers, and an unbreakable asset.

[PSO2] Proof of triggering a Photon Blast.
Release the power that you kindled!
*Not unlockable in NGS.

[PSO2] Proof of entering an Alliance Quarters.
Let's all support each other, until it feels natural for you to be right alongside us.

[PSO2] Proof of getting a high score in Trick Darts.
Aim your darts at the board over there, and *shunk*!

trophies.trophyName: Vol Dragon, the Supreme Ruler of Purgatory
trophies.trophyDetail:
[PSO2] Proof of killing Vol Dragon.
May it perish in the fires of the volcano it was dunked in!
*Restricted to single party areas.

trophies.trophyName: Quartz Dragon, Ruler of the Wild Blue Skies
trophies.trophyDetail:
[PSO2] Proof of killing Quartz Dragon.
In its insolence, it personally killed our noble dragons!
*Restricted to single party areas.

trophies.trophyName: Fang Banser, Assassin of the Secret Forest
trophies.trophyDetail:
[PSO2] Proof of killing Fang Banser.
"King of Beasts" refers to those who would first sic others on the enemy before themselves.
*Restricted to single party areas.

[PSO2] Proof of destroying Big Varder.
As always, big launchers on big warships are the stuff of dreams! Although no idea who made itâ€¦
*Restricted to single party areas.

trophies.trophyName: Dark Ragne, Predator of the Abyss
trophies.trophyDetail:
[PSO2] Proof of killing Dark Ragne.
As far as this immensely spacious universe, are they pests, or are they beneficial insects?
*Restricted to single party areas.

[PSO2] Proof you've changed your Main Class to a Hunter of Level 30 or higher.
Yeah, you know Hunters are the best! Don't bother being a Force! They always need to be protected.

trophies.trophyName: Turned Into an Archer Wielding Flames
trophies.trophyDetail:
[PSO2] Proof you've changed your Main Class to a Ranger of Level 30 or higher.
Rangers are awesome! Heh heh! Let's make pincushions out of every last little enemy!

trophies.trophyName: Turned Into a Creator of All Things
trophies.trophyDetail:
[PSO2] Proof you've changed your Main Class to a Force of Level 30 or higher.
Yeah, being a Force is the best after all... Being a Hunter is nothing but hot, sweaty work.

[PSO2] Proof you've changed your Main Class to a Fighter of Level 30 or higher.
Being a Fighter ain't bad, either! It's a fine choice! Just watch out for Techters!

trophies.trophyName: Turned Into a Musketeer Bearing Meteors
trophies.trophyDetail:
[PSO2] Proof you've changed your Main Class to a Gunner of Level 30 or higher.
Being a Gunner's a nice! Watch enemies dance while you shoot 'em more holes than a honeycomb!

trophies.trophyName: Turned Into One Who Controls Domains
trophies.trophyDetail:
[PSO2] Proof you've changed your Main Class to a Techter of Level 30 or higher.
Being a Techter's great. Fighter is out of the question. They get in the way of the rays we shoot.

[PSO2] Proof of clearing a quest with Quna.
Did you watch me on stage!? ...Huh, you couldn't really see me because of my invisibility power?

trophies.trophyName: Falz Hyunal, the Jet Black Beacon
trophies.trophyDetail:
[PSO2] Proof of killing Falz Hyunal.
If one who fights humans take a human form, isn't it because human forms are the strongest to take?
*Restricted to single party areas.

[PSO2] Proof of killing Chrome Dragon.
There are no assailants to be found. For here, there are only victims.
*Restricted to single party areas.

trophies.trophyName: That's Amazingly Bad Luck You've Got There
trophies.trophyDetail:
[PSO2] Proof of having failed at Armor Enhancement.
Think about it this way: At least this means you have meseta to burn, right?

[PSO2] Proof of triggering an Troy-type Photon Blast from an extremely enraged Mag.
Its Photon Blast is awoken by its intense anger, even while it maintains its calm demeanorâ€¦

trophies.trophyName: Bar Lodos, Conqueror of the Raging Currents
trophies.trophyDetail:
[PSO2] Proof of killing Bar Lodos.
Placid seas can hardly forge experienced sailors. Every crisis is an opportunity!
*Restricted to single party areas.

trophies.trophyName: Turned Into a Master of Opportunities
trophies.trophyDetail:
[PSO2] Proof you've changed your Main Class to a Braver of Level 30 or higher.
Yes, the new class, the Braver! Become a Braver today!

[PSO2] Find the hidden Lillipan hiding out in the Casino.
"Lin... (they found me)!"

trophies.trophyName: Gigur Gunnegam, the Demon of the Frozen Ice
trophies.trophyDetail:
[PSO2] Proof of killing Gigur Gunnegam.
If a divine punishment awaits him, then let him have it!
*Restricted to single party areas.

[PSO2] Proof you've changed your Main Class to a Bouncer of Level 30 or higher.
Surely it was fate that you'd become a Bouncer! Please, by all means, tell me your orders!

[PSO2] Proof of clearing the EPISODE 4 Story Quest, "The Time of Awakening."
Search for worlds yet unseen.

trophies.trophyName: Train Gidran, the Phantom Runaway Train
trophies.trophyDetail:
[PSO2] Proof of destroying Train Gidran.
There's no lying about how scary that wasâ€¦
*Restricted to single party areas.

[PSO2] Proof you've changed your Main Class to a Summoner of Level 30 or higher.
The Summoner, who can be with their beloved children even on the battlefield, is the most elegant!

[PSO2] Proof of clearing the EPISODE 5 Story Quest, "Seeking the Hand of Salvation."
And now, the doorway to a new world shall be opened.

[PSO2] Proof of clearing the EPISODE 1 Story Quest, "An Encounter with Xion."
Sooo... what kinds of records can we see from here? I've got a feeling it's going to be really fun!

[PSO2] Proof you've changed your Main Class to a Hero.
Everyone in ARKS is a Hero! Now let's go show the world!

[PSO2] Proof of clearing the EPISODE 6 Story Quest, "Goddess' Prelude".
No one is privy to the true ending.

[PSO2] Proof of destroying a luminmech.
Marvels manipulated by the Photoners.
*Restricted to single party areas.

trophies.trophyName: Turned Into a Phantom Amidst Shadow
trophies.trophyDetail:
[PSO2] Proof you've changed your Main Class to Phantom.
So you want power? Best seek the power of the "Phantom"â€¦

[NGS] Proof of causing PSE Bursts in PSO2:NGS.
Can you fight your way through?

[NGS] Proof of defeating Nogleth.
The beatings won't stop until they apologize.

[NGS] Proof of defeating Nex Aelio.
Bringing peace to Aelio is what ARKS defenders do.

[NGS] Proof of creating a Multi-weapon in PSO2:NGS.
All hail ARKS's multi-purpose innovation!

[NGS] Proof of forming a party with other players in PSO2:NGS.
Strength through diversity.

[NGS] Proof of reaching Level 20 with any class in PSO2:NGS.
ARKS defenders, reach for the stars!

[NGS] Proof of touching down on a Creative Space in PSO2:NGS.
Turn tomorrow's creation into life.

[NGS] Proof of defeating Herzig.
The war against the Starless has only just begun.

[NGS] Proof of reaching Level 75 with any class in PSO2:NGS.
You just keep growing!
